Description: Position Title:             Social Media and Marketing ExecutiveEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                        up to 14K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:             Dubai, UAE  About the Client:  A Middle Eastern make up and cosmetics brand Job Description:  § Manages all social media channels (e.g. Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn), campaigns, and team members to sustain an engaging audience experience§ and to increase audience satisfaction§ Support the marketing manager in delivering agreed activities§ Work closely with in-house or external creative agencies to design marketing materials such as brochures and adverts§ organize and attend events such as conferences, seminars, receptions and exhibitions§ produce creative content including videos and blog posts, liaise with designers, printers and organize photo shootsSkills
Skills: § At least 3 years’ experience in the similar role
§ Extensive Knowledge of Social Media Platforms, Advertising, Copywriting, Content Creation, Public Relations and Brand Marketing Experience
Must have an experience working in Retail industry (preferably in make up or cosmetics)
